item.name: Change LB Method to Global Availability

item.description:
Authenticate to a BIG-IP device.

Input Variables:
bigip_mgmt      BIG-IP management address
bigip_username    Username
bigip_password    Password
bigip_token_timeout  [OPTIONAL] Timeout for the auth token

Output Variables:
bigip_token      Authentication token

item.name: Create DNS Validating Resolver Cache router01.branch01
DOESN'T WORK Add DNS Local Zone router01.branch01
Add iRule DC1 UDP Listener router01.branch01
Add iRule DC1 TCP Listener router01.branch01
Add iRule DC2 UDP Listener router01.branch01
Add iRule DC2 TCP Listener router01.branch01
